title: Intensive Short-Term Course on Mobile-Based Educational Website Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic web usage skills and foundational knowledge of HTML/CSS
context.additional_context: A course to develop web development skills for language learning websites in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Evaluates practical skills through project-based assessments

learning_goals: They can analyze mobile-optimized educational website requirements by applying software engineering methodologies.
Responsive design principles can be applied to structure effective language learning content in smartphone environments
Collaborative tools can be utilized to develop an educational website prototype in teams of three and submit project deliverables

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
